website_summaries.verdict: A solid starter train set for beginners that will last a long time. An excellent value for your money.
pros: EZ track is a nice feature for such a mid-priced train set
cons: Some users complain of problems with the wiring, so it's worth knowing that is a possibility

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: They look very nice. They are made of plastic but the engine. They look great under the christmas tree.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Definitely an investment for someone who loves trains!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this train as he loves trains and loves the aspect of assembling the tracks himself. The assembly was somewhat challenging until we decided to follow directions. The end product was so beautiful that my husband decided to "build around" the train track. We have been accumulating other things we can build around this beautiful train track and cannot wait to see the end product.
customer_reviews.author: shikha shah

customer_reviews.title: Great set, very nice detail, runs smooth
customer_reviews.text: Great train set, both our sons loved it! The detail on the trains, especially the engine, is impressive. I've had my own trains over the years, including large G-scale stuff. These are every bit as detailed and fun. No complaints thus far, they run just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice starter set
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice starter set. Everything you need for a basic layout, and a great value (I don't think you could buy an engine and 4 cars separately for the price of this whole set). Added a little more track (a couple switches etc) and the kids love it. Only gripe is that the transformer it has does not have taps to power switches and accessories (They make a very similar looking one that does), but that is a relatively minor quibble.
customer_reviews.author: jh

customer_reviews.title: Great train, but dcc is more fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice starter set. Lots of cars, strong locomotive. But shortly after I bought this, I bought the dcc starter set. Dcc Is a much better value for the money. If you just want a basic train, this set is the way to go, but, the dcc set gives you sound, better controller, more track and better quality track. Read my review on the dcc train set though. You might get a faulty locomotive, and the sound will quit working. The days of quality train sets lasting 50 years are over. Just do your research.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Never worked!!!
customer_reviews.text: Complete waste of money! This train set never worked. Although I purchased it, it was a birthday gift from grandma so it is double disappointment. We've googled and gone on online forums to troubleshoot and nothing works. The train never moves. No one at Bachmann is responding to emails and it's too late for an Amazon return. My son is a trooper but I know he's heartbroken. Don't waste your money - this product is clearly a hit or miss, but when its a miss you have little recourse to get it fixed/corrected.
customer_reviews.author: Jen F.

customer_reviews.title: I love it, great train set!
customer_reviews.text: It was running in only 20 minutes out of the box It doesn't even derail at 80% of full speed. Full speed is scary fast, & still no derail in 5 revolutions pushing an old Burlington Dummy engine, plus pulling the four cars. I slowed it back down to 80% as not to damage it in case the caboose comes uncuplied again. Only one loose caboose problem in 7 hours of running. When i first started the train yesterday, i changed speed too fast that got the caboose loose. No problems since.
customer_reviews.author: bruce w. baker

customer_reviews.title: Great train set!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this train set three times now. One for me and then two for gifts. The set is super easy to setup; within 15 minutes I was driving. The tracks come together easily with a set of guides. This stops the bending of the tiny metal clips that hold the tracks together. The trains and cars are realistic looking and I’ve had zero problems. The locomotive even has a light.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Engine stayed on track just fine but could not get cars to stay on more ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this train set, company name was Train World. Engine stayed on track just fine but could not get cars to stay on more than one or two times around. Sent train back to Train World, was charged $5 for return label & 15% restocking fee, so you will not get a full refund if not happy with this product. Tried for two hours at different speeds & number of cars behind engine, cars would not stay on the track.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The most frustrating train EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I won’t give it a one star ONLY because after you spend 5 minutes perfectly placing the engine on the track, it will actually go around the track. That’s it! I cannot get other cars to connect and run without constantly derailing. The connectors are the most flimsy things I’ve ever seen. To say we are disappointed would be a grave understatement. It has left my son who absolutely adores trains very upset with the fact that only one piece of his train works. Definitely will return!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dej Peyton

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: The set is expected and looks great. I also ordered an expansion set of track with 4 switches and extra straights. The only problems I had was the hopper car is a little light and derail going through the switch but adding a little extra weight helped and the only real beef I have is that the people are not painted and are too big for HO. I use matchbox cars as the are very close to scale and they look like go-carts next to the people.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie

customer_reviews.title: It gets going to a pretty speed at it's fastest
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 9 year old son. This initial set can only be setup in an oval. We will definitely be buying more track pieces as he wants to try different layouts. For now he is enjoying it in the oval. It gets going to a pretty speed at it's fastest. My husband was pleased with how well the track pieces connected to each other. We put it into the oval shape in the living room and were able to transport it upstairs to my son's room without it breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Quality train set that's a snap to assemble and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This product completed our xmas tree decor. I was also able to use my 40-year old HO scale trains from when I was a kid on the new set, so that's a total bonus. The level of detail in the trains and the easy to assemble tracks/power component made it worth the purchase. I am totally satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: 4jone

customer_reviews.title: Husband Loves It!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as he had an old train set as a kid (and I was out of ideas for him for Christmas presents). He was absolutely astonished at how nice the set is. He put it together and set it around the tree. He is planning to get more tracks for it and expand on this new found hobby.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Mildly satisfied
customer_reviews.text: First train. Ordered for my boys and father (whom loved toy trains as a child). I’m not an expert, but the train is difficult to put on the rails correctly and it jumps the track often (very frustrating). The connections for the cars is poor and flimsy. When it is on the track it’s awesome and they all LOVE IT! Just wish the design was better, but now I know what to look for on my next train purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Holly

customer_reviews.title: ... set about three months ago and have had very good luck with it
customer_reviews.text: We got this set about three months ago and have had very good luck with it. The locomotive is great. It is handsome and also rather powerful. We DID have to order another caboose, since the one that came with the set had a warped wheel truck that made it un-runnable. The EZ track is a great invention that almost eliminates derailments from faulty track. We have purchased some extra cars off the internet and right now the train has nine cars. It is lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for the Money.
customer_reviews.text: The product is good, but I have a few complaints. The couplers sometimes come loose on incline/decline, which can be irritating. The locomotive could have a little more speed, but overall, considering a single Locomotive can cost upwards of $200, this is a pretty good deal. I really like it. Works well so far, and does not derail as easily as other trains. Well made for price. People may complain about the product being cheaply made, but, if you want more quality, you must spend more money. Do not expect something phenomenal from a cheap price. I personally like it. Easily worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Trains work well
customer_reviews.text: Trains are easy to assemble, they work well. The accessories are really junky.... in particular the tower is total junk even when glued it’s totally wobbly. But that said, I bought the set for the trains and they really do work fine.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonSmile Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wish they had been a bit heavier--they are not ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish they had been a bit heavier--they are not as durable as the ones I had when I was a child
customer_reviews.author: CKeeney

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. However, engine that came with set seems to be having issues after 1 month use. Has slowed significantly and stalls on occasion. . Another engine ( a DCC compatible engine ) that was given to me as present works great after 1 month use.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Marie Raab

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't function properly
customer_reviews.text: This set was delivered on January 7. I set it up about 2 weeks later and it worked great. I was running it at a low speed when suddenly it started going really fast. The controller won't control the speed. I have contacted bachmann support but have not heard from them yet. If this had happened 3 days earlier I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: its a nice set,
customer_reviews.text: its a nice set,,, very Difficult setting up the tracks and than the trains,,, took awhile to make the engine car run smoothly...
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Understand whas HO is.
customer_reviews.text: I have monkey hands, could not keep train on track. It was very difficult for me to put cars together let alone on the tracks.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Lassus

customer_reviews.title: This is a good train but some of the train parts are difficult ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good train but some of the train parts are difficult to attach. The parts to attach the train cars are very flimsy and made of thin plastic. The train cars detach very easily. I would have given it a five star but due to some of the issues with the materials and connections, I gave it a four star.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivered ontime and Bachman is still a great startup train company for the first time railroader!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go for it. All in all it’s a good kit.
customer_reviews.text: The locomotive is great, the cars are great, and the tracks are great. The power supply is fantastic as well. However, the rest of the kit isn’t that great. The people are all pink, and the put-them-together pieces don’t really go together well. Go for it though. I love watching this thing go down the tracks. And it brings back good memories of when daddy had the same train model kits when I was growing up.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Moore

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking set and we are enjoying using it.
customer_reviews.author: SKWvt

customer_reviews.title: Very good train.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little train for the money. Had one like it years ago. Makes me want and seriously thinking on doing a layout in the garage now. It would be fun and keep me busy. Wish the light was a little brighter though.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Do better research before buying
customer_reviews.text: Train was too small and delicate four a four year old. I returned it. If you are interested in trains it is better to know about trains scale before purchasing a train online. Sometimes pictures can be quite deceiving. The train was made welI but not suitable for the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: I really love this train though I find the engine is not ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love this train though I find the engine is not quite powerful enough to pull all the cars. I just took one car off and the train worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: MJH

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Best Buy for the money, it comes with more parts and track than the rest of the sets .
customer_reviews.author: ted levine

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. Upu should not speed up though
customer_reviews.author: Nataly Model

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas and after less than a month of light to moderate use, it started to malfunction. I don’t know if the problem is with the engine or the controller, but the engine won’t stop running when it is on the track. I wish I had not bought the set in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: N. Zarr

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Perfect gift for our 5 year old grandson. Highly engaging. Buy it-it’s worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Belen

customer_reviews.title: Read the manual for maintenance
customer_reviews.text: Very good starter set. I did a lot of homework before purchasing and was hesitant because of some of the negative reviews on coupling and derailing. Read the manual before putting together and have had 0 problems. Just make sure track fits together without any of the rails connections ticking up and train should run fine. 7 yr old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set!
customer_reviews.text: What a great starter set! My four year old and I put this together. It's simple enough that he didn't have much trouble with most of it!
customer_reviews.author: DougTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Good train if it stayed on track
customer_reviews.text: Train is ok for price compared to other train prices...it set up easy but the train derails to much was dissapointed this was my first ho scale i have had a g scale that worked better..i bought this with an open mind not expecting the best wanted to be happy with it but honestly im not if it stayed on the track i would be
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Rebuilding an old hobby
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy & pleased with the Bachman rail chief train set. It's a great addition to my rebuilding of a hobby from 24 years ago. It's easy to set up & would be an excellent first train set.
customer_reviews.author: Grover (sharkbait)

customer_reviews.title: Missing a train and broken wheels.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly disappointed. Train set arrived broken and missing a train. Sad, because this was to be used for a funeral memorial table. Not sure if I should send back and repurchase or what....
customer_reviews.author: R fahlenkamp

customer_reviews.title: Family fun for sure!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice toy for kids and grown-ups! Easy to assemble, lot's of family fun!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Nice train set
customer_reviews.text: The train and track seem to be good quality. But the little cheap signs and people that come with it are pretty much trash. Electric is very nice compared to batteries. It goes quick and smooth. The cars don’t connect automatically though
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a lot of products from Amazon but this far worst. It is total junk it made me sick to pays this much for a train set of this quality. The extra rail sections were the same junk.
customer_reviews.author: no bean bag

customer_reviews.title: Item was advertised as Ready to Run
customer_reviews.text: When I received it the engine had some damage, the cars had missing wheels, missing couplers, the couplers that were there were not working, I fell that this item was not ready to run as advertised. Please contact me so we can address this issue, The train set the way it is no good to me without working cars and couplers. Thank you,
customer_reviews.author: Louis Orsini

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a gift and he loves it nice train set
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Box was not even sealed so didn't appear new. Two cars were missing their wheels and I even checked the entire box thinking they would be in there some where but they were not. Engine is really slow. Bought for my sons birthday gift.
customer_reviews.author: TSCRIBNER

customer_reviews.title: Son too young for set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the son. Had to return upon advisement of spouse. Son too young, set too delicate= breakage/damage to an excellent set of trains. Bachmann = great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mike & Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Great hobby train for starters
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas. He was beyond happy with it. The lights really work and the tracks are stardy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Train is next to impossible to keep on the tracks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this train to set up around my Christmas tree. DO NOT BUY THIS TRAIN! it is next to impossible to get the train on the tracks (the wheels are SO small) and even when you do get them on, the train falls off rather easily. Its easy to assemble but almost unusable. Save your money and buy a different train set.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Vutrano

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: Missing base for train signal. Would of rated 5* if it was not missing that.
customer_reviews.author: scott t

customer_reviews.title: have. Is a piece of crap!
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money! Train derails for no apparent reason. So disappointing--- spent money for a new train for the grandchildren, and it rus no better than the old one we hae.
customer_reviews.author: Suebo

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Tracks are defective. One of the wagons is missing the wheels. The only reason I am not sending it back is my son is too exited and getting another one would be too long
customer_reviews.author: helier

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for starters who want to get started with Model Railroading! If your a big fan of BNSF this set is perfect for you or your kid or grand kids! Just make sure you don’t let your kids eat the little people and signs c:
customer_reviews.author: Plezingscents 4u

customer_reviews.title: Set was too hard to get the cars aligned on ...
customer_reviews.text: Set was too hard to get the cars aligned on the track, and the track sections didn't fit together very well so that the train kept derailing. I'm bummed that it didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Yorgason

customer_reviews.title: I love that we can add to the tracks and elaborate ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves trains. We got this for him for his 5th birthday. I love that we can add to the tracks and elaborate on the setting over time. Would recommend it to others
customer_reviews.author: Doreen C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Train!
customer_reviews.text: Great starter train! My five year old daughter and I had it up and running in literally 15 minutes. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Drake

customer_reviews.title: Locomotive lover
customer_reviews.text: Love this BNSF train, the engine is awesome. Cant wait to run this baby.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G.

customer_reviews.title: Runs great - headlight does not work
customer_reviews.text: Train runs great, speed is good, and very easy to assemble. The only problem I see is with headlight on engine. It does not glow. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 6 years old son just love ❤️ it awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jawaria

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson was very pleased with this train set he received for Christmas!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very fun..
customer_reviews.text: Very fun... Love the train inc. Great respect for the ones who crawl on these steel horses and work them long hours and keep the goods coming to the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Dee55

customer_reviews.title: great set for young or old
customer_reviews.text: It is a great set for young or old to get started in model trains. Well worth the price which is reasonable. It is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Amazon made the return easy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 your old who loves trains. The cars were tough to keep connected. I tried a single car and it would not stay on the track, I returned the item. On a positive note, Amazon made the return easy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my grandson who loves trains. Does not work well, hard to set up. A waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Marty G

customer_reviews.title: We liked the looks and how easy it was to assemble
customer_reviews.text: We liked the looks and how easy it was to assemble. However, it was very touchy and hard to keep running for some reason. It was a gift to my Grandson. His mother just packed it up and put in storage. Very disappointed for him.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa W.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible deaign.. dont buy
customer_reviews.text: stupid design.. i was so frustrated and my child was frustrated also as it is very difficult for a child even an adult to put the train on the track. If the child wishes to pick it up its almost impossible to put it back on the track. Impossible to connect the other train carts.. such a horrible design. Dont buy it. Waist of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Ajay  Singh

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this set. Train set very flimsy. Falls apart easily. Railcars do not hook up properly Train falls off track. Very cheap product. Regret purchasing for xmas as my son was looking forward to it
customer_reviews.author: Juan B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It needs a passenger car. Works well in my Christmas village.
customer_reviews.author: Larry E. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with this purchase. My son loves this detailed train set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT train set
customer_reviews.text: GREAT train set. My son loves it! Very happy. You have to take the time to make sure that the tracks are attached properly and I didn't have any problems. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Big Red

customer_reviews.title: be-aware not to cause a power surge as the circuit ...
customer_reviews.text: be-aware not to cause a power surge as the circuit breaker in the locomotive will keep the loco off for at least 5 minutes from my experience
customer_reviews.author: athrun

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I had a super great Christmas morning and afternoon with my Grandson setting up his new train. HE LOVED IT so much.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Train boy
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this model ! I will be adding to his collection he’s a train fanatic .
customer_reviews.author: Narisa khan shirley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it, however, he go board easily. You definitely have to make a hobby out of it.
customer_reviews.author: CDM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This set runs awesome. It added just what i was looking for to my layout!!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Great value and product
customer_reviews.text: Grandson 9 yes old having a blast with this Christmas gift
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth B.

customer_reviews.title: Empty box missing trains
customer_reviews.text: Box came and it was literally empty. Where trains should have been, they were not there.
customer_reviews.author: sshockey

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I kept bugging my mum to buy this for me for our christmas tree, the EZ track was well, easy to connect, we bought two extra rolling stock and it still worked fine there, this is not DCC ready, your going to have to glue it on.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper1234

customer_reviews.title: Great train set
customer_reviews.text: great train set, some of the extras( signs , people & bridge ) are cheap plastic, but I bought the set for the train ,not the extras.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Two of the train cars were missing wheels and cannot be used
customer_reviews.author: Cecil Keltner

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with a train set
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy it more than the child I got it for
customer_reviews.author: Vernon long

customer_reviews.title: The train is very beautiful and looks like an actuall replica of a real ...
customer_reviews.text: The train is very beautiful and looks like an actuall replica of a real train, however this toy fits more for older children but in all i would definitely recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: b can

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son and Grandson enjoyed playing with this train set and work great!!
customer_reviews.author: Annette Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner set for adults and kids!! Nice track and nice high quality cars.
customer_reviews.author: Brett V. Nosal

customer_reviews.title: bachmann rail chief
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my self. So far it runs great! This diesel locomotive is great and smooth running. I think this set is great for starting with model trains. I would recommend this set to the recommended age of 14, the cars are very delicate. I would also recommend buying some more track with your order, soon it will get boring with just an oval.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good looking Train set
customer_reviews.text: The Bachmann Electric Train was in very good package when arrived at the house. The Train set is going to be a gift at Christmas. I haven't opened the Train package yet but being able to look through the package and see the Rail Chief and the rest of the train cars that come with the set they look Great. I am very happy that I chose this Train Set. I know my grandson will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Star 711

customer_reviews.title: The coupler on two of the cars do not connect ...
customer_reviews.text: The coupler on two of the cars do not connect properly. My son loves it but may request new cars.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: great so far...
customer_reviews.text: it is awesome. it has had 3-4 problems which were easily corrected. I read the instructions! everyone who has had problems with this set, READ THE INSTRUCTIONS!!!!!! awesome set for great price! do not make the mistake i did, buying this as a beginner set for the accessories. they are junk. but all beginners, just a word of advice, BUY THIS GREAT DEAL NOW!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Salem

customer_reviews.title: The wire connection from transformer didn't work unless you held ...
customer_reviews.text: The wire connection from transformer didn't work unless you held it and bent it up to make train operate.
customer_reviews.author: Hubert White

customer_reviews.title: Pacific Flyer Bachmann Electric Train
customer_reviews.text: I Liked that the tracks were sturdy and that the main train is well made. This train set is very frustratung because it keeps stopping and you have to go back to where you started for it to continue. Also the other trains did not latch on and are made very flimsy. I am going to call the company to complain. But buyers please beware it is very cheaply made for the price you are paying. Had I paid $39 I wouldnt be complaining
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They sure love it. Great product
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my nephews for Christmas. They sure love it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: JeremyÃÂ Petska

customer_reviews.title: You will be appalled at the cheapness factor
customer_reviews.text: Poor Quality. Has the feel of $50 worth of train but costs $140.00 Big mistake. The tracks are so flimsy, the controller so cheap. I cannot imagine a child getting these horrible little train wheels onto the tracks, they are so unwieldy. The worst feature though, is the couplers. After 1/2 hour struggling to get the cars to stay together, it all went back in the box. TRAINWORLD, it seems, takes a %15 re-stocking fee and will NOT pay for return shipping. So all in, about $30 dollars to learn a valuable lesson.
customer_reviews.author: John Brian Moran

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: He really enjoyed getting it he has had fun and will to come
customer_reviews.author: Donna Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: The engine and cars have fantastic detail. The track pieces don't always go together ...
customer_reviews.text: The engine and cars have fantastic detail. The track pieces don't always go together as smoothly and easily as advertised. Sometimes the plastic will join, but the rails will not join flush and it can take a bit of working them to get them to slide together. I bought this as a starter set to see if my kid will be interested in model railroading - and for this purpose this set fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The hooks are a little flimsy and I need 2 or 3 more cars to go with it
customer_reviews.author: Darren Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This train is good quality and wash to assemble. I really don't do this kind of stuff but I put a piece of ply wood down set the train on it for my 5 year old he can operatecit by himself with little trouble. I recommend this if it a train u want.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: too intricate
customer_reviews.text: bought for 5 yr old and it is way too hard to get train on the tracks & keep the cars attached. Maybe it would be all right for an older child but my husband had trouble with it too....so would probably pick a different set.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Clark

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Attractive set has coupling issues that are nagging. Track assembly is cake.
customer_reviews.author: dan k.

customer_reviews.title: i like it
customer_reviews.text: Finally I can fulfill my desire has dreamed since childhood, and I can enjoy playing and creating with my beloved daughter
customer_reviews.author: Eko Oktario

customer_reviews.title: Horribly made trains and track
customer_reviews.text: This is a train is terribly made. We bought it for my son for Christmas and one of the tracks was bent, the connectors that connect the train didn’t stay together and one broke off as we tried to connect it. We are so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: William A.

customer_reviews.title: I wanted something that was better than a crappy toy grade
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift to go around the tree at Christmas. I wanted something that was better than a crappy toy grade, affordable, and at least reasonably durable, preferably with replacement parts available. I don't have any plans to expand on the set, but it's nice to know track is available. This set fit the bill perfect. Out of the box it ran without a hiccup and was easy to assemble. The cars look great and I think the build quality is great for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

product_meta.title: Bachmann Trains - Rail Chief Ready To Run 130 Piece Electric Train Set - HO Scale
product_meta.description:
5-Car "HO scale" Train - EMD GP40 diesel locomotive (with operating headlight) - open quad hopper- gondola- steel Reefer- off-center caboose body-mounted E-Z Mate couplers 47" X 38” oval track sets up in minutes includes signal bridge, 36 people figures, 24 telephone poles and 48 railroad and street signs includes Power pack, speed controller and plug-in terminal rerailer plugs into an AC outlet ages 14+

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
You will command the rails with our striking Rail Chief set. Complete with miniature people and a signal bridge, this 130-piece set will let you oversee your own detailed railroading empire. This ready-to-run train set includes: EMD GP40 diesel locomotive with operating headlight, open quad hopper car, gondola car, steel reefer car, off-center caboose, 47" x 38" oval of snap-fit E-Z Track, including 12 pieces curved track, 1 piece straight track, and 1 plug-in terminal rerailer, signal bridge, 36 miniature people, 24 telephone poles, 48 railroad and street signs, power pack and speed controller.
feature_bullets: Complete Ready To Run 130 Piece Freight Train Set
Powered by a EMD GP40 Diesel Locomotive with Operating Headlight
Includes; Open Quad Hopper Car, Gondola Car, Steel Reefer Car, Off-Set Cupola Caboose, Signal Bridge, Miniature Figures, Railroad Signs, Street Signs, and Telephone Poles
47" x 38" Oval of Snap-Fit E-Z Track, Power Pack and Speed Controller
